## R data Exploration

```{r}
#call packages
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
```

```{r}
GGally::ggpairs(diamonds)
```

```{r}
GGally::ggpairs(diamonds, 
                columns = c(1,4,5,7), 
                ggplot2::aes(colour = cut))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, 
       aes(x = carat, y = price)) + 
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, 
       aes(x = price, fill = cut)) + 
  geom_histogram()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, 
       aes(x=clarity, y = price)) +
  geom_boxplot() + 
  labs(x = "Clarity", 
       y = "Price ($)", 
       title = "Diamonds' clairty and price")
```
